import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { ArrowRightIcon, CheckIcon, StarIcon, TruckIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, CurrencyRupeeIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { fetchFeaturedProducts } from '../store/slices/productSlice'; import { fetchCategories } from '../store/slices/categorySlice'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/common/LoadingSpinner'; import Button from '../components/common/Button'; const Home = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { featuredProducts, loading: productsLoading } = useSelector((state) => state.products); const { categories, loading: categoriesLoading, isRateLimited, lastFetched } = useSelector((state) => state.categories); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchFeaturedProducts({ limit: 8 })); // Only fetch categories if we don't have them, not rate limited, and haven't fetched recently const fiveMinutesAgo = Date.now() - (5 * 60 * 1000); if (categories.length === 0 && !isRateLimited && (!lastFetched || lastFetched < fiveMinutesAgo)) { dispatch(fetchCategories()); } }, [dispatch, categories.length, isRateLimited, lastFetched]); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Free Shipping', description: 'Free shipping on orders above â‚¹500' }, { icon: , title: 'Quality Guarantee', description: '100% quality assured products' }, { icon: , title: 'Best Prices', description: 'Competitive pricing for all products' } ]; const stats = [ { label: 'Products', value: '500+' }, { label: 'Happy Customers', value: '10,000+' }, { label: 'Years Experience', value: '25+' }, { label: 'Cities Served', value: '50+' } ]; if (productsLoading || categoriesLoading) { return ; } return (

{category.name}

))}

); }; export default Home;
